Detailed Description

A simple container class for platforms that we plan to add to the map during mapgen.

Member Function Documentation

def platform.Platform.__init__ (   self,
  loc,
  width 
)

Instantiate a Platform.

The loc and width parameters are in gridspace units; convert them into realspace units because the QuadTree class works better on larger units.

Parameters:
loc The location, in gridspace, of the platform
width The width, in blocks, of the platform.

def platform.Platform.getBounds (   self  ) 

Return a bounding box for the platform.
